clipboardHistory.value:
git init --bare ~/.dotfiles
alias dot='git --git-dir=$HOME/.dotfiles --work-tree=$HOME'

# Ignore anything you don’t want tracked (Downloads, etc.)
echo -e '.cache\n.trash\n' >> ~/.gitignore

# Stage your configs
dot add ~/.config ~/.local/share/omarchy ~/.zshrc ~/.bashrc ~/.config/doom
dot commit -m "first snapshot"
dot remote add origin git@github.com:yourname/dotfiles.git
dot push -u origin main

gh repo create yourname/dotfiles        --private --clone=no
gh repo create yourname/arch-bootstrap  --public  --clone=no

git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/vinceliuice/MacTahoe-icon-theme ~/MacTahoe
cd ~/MacTahoe
./install.sh          # installs to ~/.local/share/icons by default
#  ./install.sh -d /usr/share/icons   ⬅︎ system-wide (needs sudo)
#  ./install.sh -c dark -o solid      ⬅︎ dark + opaque folders example

;; ~/.config/doom/config.el
(after! evil
  ;; make y/p operate on the + register by default
  (setq evil-clipboard-autosave t)   ; Doom helper
  (evil-set-register ?\" ?+)         ; default register → clipboard
  (evil-set-register ?0 ?+))         ; yank-pop ring also → clipboard

(defun my/resize-splash (src dst width)
  "Resize SRC to WIDTH px wide and save as DST (PNG)."
  (let* ((data (create-image src 'imagemagick nil :width width))
         (buf  (generate-new-buffer " *splash-resize*")))
    (with-current-buffer buf
      (insert-image data)
      (let ((coding-system-for-write 'binary))
        (write-region (car (image-mask-p data)) nil dst)))
    (kill-buffer buf)
    (message "Splash saved → %s" dst)))

;;; doom-retreon-theme.el --- Retro neon‑violet Doom Emacs theme -*- lexical-binding: t; no-byte-compile: t; -*-
;; Author: <your‑name>
;; Maintainer: <maintainer‑name>
;; Source: VS Code “Retreon” palette, rebuilt brighter (2025‑06‑30).
;;
;;; Commentary:
;;  Retreon 2 ·  A synth‑wave nightscape: deep indigo canvas (#0d0716) with
;;  glowing banana‑yellow, bubble‑gum pink, toxic‑lime, and electric‑cyan
;;  accents.  The original Retreon blue was almost black on many monitors, so
;;  this version lifts the blues ~30 % and tightens contrast across key faces
;;  (which‑key, org, magit, modeline, etc.).
;;
;;  Drop this file onto your `custom-theme-load-path`, then:
;;      M-x load-theme RET doom-retreon RET
;;
;;; Code:

(require 'doom-themes)

;;;###theme-autoload

(defgroup doom-retreon-theme nil
  "Options for the `doom-retreon' theme."
  :group 'doom-themes)

(defcustom doom-retreon-padded-modeline doom-themes-padded-modeline
  "If non-nil, adds a 4‑px padding to the mode‑line.
Can be an integer to specify exact padding."
  :type '(choice integer boolean)
  :group 'doom-retreon-theme)

;; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
;;; Palette
;; (original hex  →  new hex if changed)
;; bg           : #0d0716
;; bg-alt       : #15132b
;; blue         : #3821a0 → #4f3bf7  (brighter for which‑key, links, etc.)
;; dark-blue    : #231f44 → #352c80  (matching lift)
;;
;; other hues keep their original Retreon values.
;; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

(def-doom-theme doom-retreon
  "Retro‑violet neon synthwave theme (Retreon 2)."

  ;; name        default          256            16
  ((bg         '("#0d0716"      "#0d0716"     nil))
   (bg-alt     '("#15132b"      "#15132b"     nil))
   (base0      '("#111024"      "#111024"     "black"))
   (base1      '("#181630"      "#181630"     "brightblack"))
   (base2      '("#1f1c3a"      "#1f1c3a"     "brightblack"))
   (base3      '("#231f44"      "#231f44"     "brightblack"))
   (base4      '("#301f44"      "#301f44"     "brightblack"))
   (base5      '("#3e3466"      "#3e3466"     "brightblack"))
   (base6      '("#5d518d"      "#5d518d"     "brightblack"))
   (base7      '("#a090ff"      "#a090ff"     "brightblack"))
   (base8      '("#acafda"      "#acafda"     "white"))
   (fg         '("#acafda"      "#acafda"     "brightwhite"))
   (fg-alt     '("#dcdfff"      "#dcdfff"     "white"))

   ;; --- Accent hues -------------------------------------------------------
   (grey        base5)
   (red         '("#ff0526" "#ff0526" "red"))
   (orange      '("#ff6c00" "#ff6c00" "brightred"))
   (yellow      '("#ffbb00" "#ffbb00" "yellow"))
   (green       '("#9bf700" "#9bf700" "green"))
   (teal        '("#00c9c5" "#00c9c5" "brightcyan"))
   (blue        '("#4f3bf7" "#4f3bf7" "brightblue")) ; lifted from #3821a0
   (dark-blue   '("#352c80" "#352c80" "blue"))
   (magenta     '("#fd0b98" "#fd0b98" "brightmagenta"))
   (violet      '("#fa00c4" "#fa00c4" "magenta"))
   (cyan        '("#6AEBF7" "#6AEBF7" "brightcyan"))
   (dark-cyan   '("#00c9c5" "#00c9c5" "cyan"))

   ;; --- Face categories ---------------------------------------------------
   (highlight      magenta)
   (vertical-bar   base3)
   (selection      base4)
   (builtin        teal)
   (comments       (doom-lighten base5 0.1))
   (doc-comments   (doom-lighten base5 0.3))
   (constants      magenta)
   (functions      green)
   (keywords       violet)
   (methods        green)
   (operators      violet)
   (type           yellow)
   (strings        cyan)
   (variables      fg)
   (numbers        magenta)
   (region         (doom-blend blue bg 0.35))
   (error          red)
   (warning        orange)
   (success        green)
   (vc-modified    orange)
   (vc-added       green)
   (vc-deleted     red)

   ;; --- Modeline ----------------------------------------------------------
   (modeline-bg     base4)
   (modeline-bg-alt (doom-darken base4 0.25))
   (modeline-fg     fg)
   (modeline-fg-alt fg-alt)

   (-modeline-pad
    (when doom-retreon-padded-modeline
      (if (integerp doom-retreon-padded-modeline)
          doom-retreon-padded-modeline
        4))))

  ;; -----------------------------------------------------------------------
  ;;;; Face overrides
  ((highlight :foreground bg :background highlight)
   (region :background (doom-blend blue bg 0.45) :foreground fg :extend t)
   (secondary-selection :background (doom-blend violet bg 0.30))

   ;; Search
   (lazy-highlight :background (doom-blend teal bg 0.35) :foreground fg :weight 'bold)
   (isearch         :background yellow :foreground bg :weight 'bold)

   ;; Modeline faces
   (mode-line :background modeline-bg :foreground modeline-fg
              :box (when -modeline-pad `(:line-width ,-modeline-pad :color ,modeline-bg)))
   (mode-line-inactive :background modeline-bg-alt :foreground modeline-fg-alt
                       :box (when -modeline-pad `(:line-width ,-modeline-pad :color ,modeline-bg-alt)))

   ;; which-key popup keys / bullets (use brighter blue)
   (which-key-key-face       :foreground blue :weight 'bold)
   (which-key-separator-face :foreground blue)

   ;; Comments
   (font-lock-comment-face :foreground comments :slant 'italic)
   (font-lock-doc-face     :foreground doc-comments :slant 'italic)

   ;; Diff / VC
   (diff-added   :background (doom-blend green bg 0.15) :foreground green)
   (diff-removed :background (doom-blend red   bg 0.15) :foreground red)
   (diff-changed :background (doom-blend orange bg 0.15) :foreground orange)

   ;; Org headings
   (org-level-1 :foreground green   :weight 'bold :height 1.2)
   (org-level-2 :foreground magenta :weight 'bold :height 1.1)
   (org-level-3 :foreground yellow  :weight 'bold)
   (org-level-4 :foreground blue)

   ;; Rainbow-delimiters
   (rainbow-delimiters-depth-1-face :foreground blue)
   (rainbow-delimiters-depth-2-face :foreground yellow)
   (rainbow-delimiters-depth-3-face :foreground green)
   (rainbow-delimiters-depth-4-face :foreground magenta)
   (rainbow-delimiters-depth-5-face :foreground cyan)
   (rainbow-delimiters-depth-6-face :foreground orange)
   (rainbow-delimiters-depth-7-face :foreground violet)
   (rainbow-delimiters-depth-8-face :foreground red)
   (rainbow-delimiters-depth-9-face :foreground dark-cyan)

   ;; Paren match
   (show-paren-match :background blue :foreground bg :weight 'bold))

;;;###autoload
(provide-theme 'doom-retreon)
;;; doom-retreon-theme.el ends here
